meanings.definition: having a crisp and loud sound when bitten or chewed
meanings.sent1: The apple was the crunchiest fruit in the basket.
meanings.sent2: I love the crunchiest potato chips.
meanings.sent3: The crunchiest carrot made a surprise appearance in the salad.
meanings.sent4: Her footsteps on the snow were the crunchiest of all.
meanings.sent5: The crunchiest toast was always his favorite breakfast.

meanings.definition: in a manner that produces a loud and crisp sound when bitten or chewed
meanings.sent1: She chewed the gum crunchiest during the movie.
meanings.sent2: The leaves rustled crunchiest in the autumn breeze.
meanings.sent3: The dog barked crunchiest when it heard a noise outside.
meanings.sent4: The fire crackled crunchiest in the fireplace.
meanings.sent5: The popcorn popped crunchiest in the microwave.

meanings.definition: the quality of being crisp and loud when bitten or chewed
meanings.sent1: The crunchiest of the cookies was gone in seconds.
meanings.sent2: The cereal was the crunchiest breakfast option.
meanings.sent3: The crunchiest sound came from the old radio.
meanings.sent4: The crunchiest leaves covered the forest floor.
meanings.sent5: The toast was the crunchiest part of the meal.
